io::DataInput Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <DataInput.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::DataInput:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Interface for reading primitive types from the input in portable way.


Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

virtual int io::DataInput::read (  void *  data,
int  size
)  [pure virtual]
 

Tries to read specified number of bytes from the source stream.

Doesn't block the caller if specified number of bytes isn't available.

Returns:
Number of bytes actually read.
Exceptions:
IOException 

Implemented in io::DataInputStream.

virtual void io::DataInput::readUTF (  char *  buf,
int  bufsize
)  [pure virtual]
 

Reads string encoded in UTF-8 from the stream.

Parameters:
buf [out] Receives 0-terminated UTF-8 string.
bufsize Maximum size for the string. IOException is thrown if buffer too small.
